Typography

Heading 1 - 40px Bold

Use for main page titles

Heading 2 - 28px Semibold

Use for section headers

Heading 3 - 20px Semibold

Use for card titles and subsections

Body text - 16px Regular. Use for main content and paragraphs. This is the default text style for most content.

Use for body content

Small text - 14px Regular. Use for supporting text and captions.

Use for supporting information

Buttons

Primary

Secondary

Outline

Ghost

Sizes

Cards

Basic Card

Standard card with rounded-2xl corners, subtle shadow, and border.

Hoverable Card

Card with hover effect - shadow increases on hover for interactive elements.

Gradient Card

Use sparingly for CTAs and special highlights.

Highlighted Card

Use for featured content or important notices.

Form Elements

Spacing & Layout

Whitespace Philosophy

  • Use generous whitespace - let content breathe
  • Card padding: p-6 (24px)
  • Section spacing: mb-8 or mb-16
  • Element gaps: gap-3, gap-4, gap-6

Icons

Using emojis for now - clean and simple. Can be replaced with icon library later.

Design Principles

üé® Clean & Minimal

Off-white backgrounds, subtle borders, no gradients unless needed for emphasis.

üéØ Purposeful Color

Purple for primary actions, Teal for secondary/accents. Use sparingly.

üìê Consistent Spacing

Generous whitespace, card-based layouts, rounded-2xl corners everywhere.
